scripts.install:all: cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.dev:all: npm run dev:client & npm run dev:server
scripts.build:all: npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint:client && npm run lint:server
scripts.clean: cd client && npm run clean && cd ../server && npm run clean
scripts.test: cd client && npm test && cd ../server && npm test
